sentence: Controversial Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., drew the ire of his fellow Republicans and House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy when he said in a podcast interview that lawmakers he looked up to? had invited him to orgies and done cocaine in front of him.
title: Potential new border surge presents one more challenge for Biden administration

sentence: On Sunday, one of their bigger lunkheads in Congress, Rep. Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, told a podcast host that his GOP colleagues were big fans of orgies and blow.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: Madison Cawthorn's cocaine-and-orgies brouhaha blows up the GOP's QAnon plan
